p: Puerarin is the major bioactive ingredient in the root of Pueraria lobate (Wild) Ohwi and has been known as a combination of medicine and food in traditional Chinese medicine for thousands of years [ 19]. Puerarin possesses a wide spectrum of biological activities including an anti-obesity effect and has been used in alternative medicine for the treatment of various metabolic disorders [ 20â€“ 22]. Nevertheless, the mechanisms of action of puerarin in these diseases remain elusive.
